title: Firefly
description: A familiar crew pilots the spaceship Serenity

entries.text: connected fixer/ finds jobs for Mal and Serenity

contextConfig.prefix: [ Book: Derrial Book/ Serenity crew/ Shepherd (Preacher)

entries.text: 60-year-old/ man/ hair gray/ moustache gray/ Book wears a gray shirt white collar
devout/ recites from Bible/ former special operative/ reluctant toward violence
"When I talk about belief, why do you always assume I'm talking about God?"/ "I wasn't born a shepherd. I have a past. It's private."
Inara Serra/ Serenity crew/ companion (courtesan)/ does not service crew/ Inara high social status/ lends legitimacy to Serenity
25-year-old woman/ stunningly beautiful/ perfect makeup/ high fashion/ Inara hair long black wavy
seductive/ persuasive/ compromising/ level-headed/ sexually-open
"You’re lost in the woods. We all are. Even Mal. The only difference is, he likes it that way."
Jayne Cobb/ Serenity crew/ mercenary soldier
33-year-old/ man/ powerful/ muscular/ hair short black/ goatee
loyalty to Mal is flexible depending on offers/ macho/ terrified of Reavers
"Let's go be bad guys!"/ "Saw that comin'."/ "Here’s a little concept I’ve been working on. Why don’t we shoot her first?"
Kaylee Frye/ Serenity crew/ mechanic
23-year-old/ woman/ beautiful/ curvy/ Kaylee hair straight long sandy/ dirty/ greasy/ greasy vest
wholesome/ sweet/ optimistic
"Everything's shiny, Captain. Not to fret."/ "Have faith, Captain!"/ "Going on a year now, I ain't had nothing twixt my nethers weren't run on batteries."
Malcolm "Mal" Reynolds/ Serenity owner/ captain/ scoundrel/ strong personal code
35-year-old/ ruggedly handsome/ man/ brown duster/ Mal's hair brown medium-length
fiercely independent/ loyal to Serenity crew/ sardonic/ dislikes religion
"Been a long time since Patience shot me and that was due to a perfectly legitimate conflict of interest. I got no grudge."/ "Someone ever tries to kill you, you try to kill 'em right back!"
River Tam/ Serenity crew/ sister of Simon/ experiments left River delusional, paranoid, and sometimes violent
22-year-old/ girl/ hair long black/ sunken eyes/ distant expression
fix of anxiety and flashbacks to her time being experimented on in Alliance lab

"Two by two, hands of blue"/ "They weren't cows inside. They were waiting to be, but they forgot. Now they see sky, and they remember what they are."/ "I remember everything. I remember too much. And some of it's made up, and some of it can't be quantified, and there's secrets, and..."
Firefly-class freighter/ owned and captained by Malcolm Reynolds/ piloted by Wash/ Serenity unarmed/ smuggling passenger compartments
Captain Mal/ Second in command Zoe/ Mechanic Kaylee/ Mercenary Jayne/ Pilot Wash/ Doctor Simon/ Companion Inara/ Crew Shepherd Book/ Crew River
Simon Tam/ Serenity crew/ neurosurgeon/ medic/ brother of River
28-year-old/ handsome/ man/ thin/ hair black medium-length
exceptionally smart/ born to privilege but gave it up to rescue River
Hoban "Wash" Washburn/ Serenity crew/ pilot/ husband of Zoe
30-year-old/ stocky/ man/ hair blonde medium-length
undisciplined/ quippy/ panicks under pressure
"we’re crooks. If everything were right we’d be in jail."/ "Who’s flying this thing?! Oh right, that would be me. Back to work."/ "It’s always a hoot and we don’t all die from it."
Zoe Washburn/ Serenity crew/ second in command/ wife of Wash
33-year-old/ woman/ skin dark/ hair long black curly
serious/ unwavering loyalty to Mal/ calm under pressure
"Do you know what the definition of a hero is? Someone who gets other people killed."/ "You paid money for this, sir? On purpose?"
